snippet: Outdoor Channel Holdings has accepted a $220.7 million takeover bid from Kroenke Sports and Entertainment, turning down an earlier offer from the media investor Leo Hindery Jr.
abstract: Outdoor Channel Holdings has accepted a $220.7 million takeover bid from Kroenke Sports and Entertainment, turning down an earlier offer from the media investor Leo Hindery Jr.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Outdoor Channel Agrees to Higher Bid From Kroenke
